title: Privacy Policy
s1_intro: At ABD RAG Platform, we collect only the information necessary to provide our documentary intelligence services:
s1_f1_body: Email, name, company, role within the organization
s1_f2_body: PDFs and files you upload for RAG analysis
s1_f3_body: Access logs, queries made, response times
s1_f4_body: Payment information processed by certified third parties (Stripe)
s2_f1: AES-256 Encryption: All documents are encrypted at rest
s2_f3: Multi-tenant isolation: Your data is physically separated from other clients
s2_f4: SOC2 Audits: Compliance verified by independent third parties
s2_f5: Automatic backups: Geographic replication with encryption
s2_f6: 2FA Authentication: Bank-grade security for your account
s3_intro: We use your information exclusively to:
s3_f1: Provide RAG analysis and semantic search services
s3_f2: Improve our AI models' accuracy (only with your explicit consent)
s3_f4: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
s3_warning: We never sell, rent, or share your data with third parties for marketing.
s4_intro: We retain your data according to the following policies:
s4_contact: You can request immediate data deletion at any time by contacting
s5_intro: Under GDPR and similar regulations, you have the right to:
s5_f1_body: Request a copy of all your data
s5_f3_body: Request complete erasure ("right to be forgotten")
s5_f4_body: Export your data in a structured format
s5_f5_body: Object to certain uses of your data
